aya mese kiyayi: “pebarawari masaye kiyewhi prajathanthrawadiwa thora path karagath aanduwata erehi bala kollaya salasum kota rusiyawe aithihasika, urumaya sahitha ekama diya nomidena unusum nawuka hamuda waraya alla ganimata woshintanaya kumanthranaya kala” bawak jon pilgar apata kiyayi: “ohuta anuwa rusiyanuwo batahirin thamanta ella wu aakramana tharjanaya pamanak nowa, yukrenaye janawargika rusiyanuwanta erehiwa ella kala fasist prahara walin owun aaraksha kirimata da madihath wuha.
